page.title: 19St Annes - Some Churches
page.content: {St Cuthbert's Parish Church: Served the farming and fishing community at Heyhouses and the West End (now St Annes) until the erection of St Annes Chapel of Ease. {St Annes Parish Church: Built in 1873 (by Paley & Austin) and enlarged in 1887 (by R.K.Freeman).This is brick built with some cobbled flushwork with a tiled roof.Queen Anne style.Tower added 1890. { {Our Lady Star of the Sea (R.C.): Built in 1890_91 (by Pugin & Pugin). It is aisleless with lancet windows. {St Paul,FairHaven : 1902-4 (Medland Taylor).Hot-red brick built also window details.West tower diagonally positioned. {St Thomas :}1899-1905 (Austin & Paley) Red brick,stone enrichment.Nave facade canted.Large tower.Tracery Decorated & Perpendicular.
